parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
Neuter of a compound of en and a derivative of optanomai; in the face of.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
A trumpet, the sound of a trumpet. Perhaps from salos; a trumpet.
